data.text: @greg_travis Do you think it's possible, tragically, the same children who were likely to die from respiratory viruses in previous years succumbed to covid recently? I'll have to look into accidents etc in previous years.

@johna_rossman Excess pediatric deaths will not tell us much given that so many pediatric deaths from accidents (traffic, etc.), respiratory diseases (influenza, RSV, etc.) were suppressed by COVID mitigations

I.e. we can have a lot of COVID pediatric deaths that won't show up in excess deaths

@greg_travis Yeah of course we never test for the flu. We know there aren't any excess pediatric deaths in 2020. Have you looked at the data for 2021? I haven't checked in recently I know death certificates are still coming in etc.
@greg_travis So covid has been as bad as 2012 and 2014 flu?
